nodes.text: Mas Avaho was a Chagrian male agent who served the Republic Strategic Information Service during the Cold War. Stationed on Nar Shaddaa, he informed a Republic spacer about a shipment of Imperial Intelligence machines that were delivered for a Sith Lord. However, he was not sure what the machines were, but they were important enough for the Sith Lord to send his apprentices to oversee the shipment.
